titles.title: Praise is the power of heaven.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Praise is the power of heaven.
Praise is the power of heaven.
Praise is the power that opens the door
To the King, the King of kings.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The powers of darkness will flee
When we praise and we magnify Thee.
Praise is the power that opens the door
To the King, the King of kings.
